channel.title: SWE Prime
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com/config"][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/sweprime.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/links.png[/img][B][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com/"] [/URL][/B][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/18718_0.png[/img] [SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com"][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Website[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana] [/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/18726_0.png[/img] [SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com/config"][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Webclient[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana] [/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/18827_0.png[/img] [SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com/config"][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Desktop Client[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana] [/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/18719_0.png[/img] [SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://sweprime.com/Highscores"][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Highscores[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Forum/features.png[/img][CENTER][FONT=Verdana] [COLOR=#008080]24/7 Uptime[/COLOR][/FONT][/CENTER][COLOR=#008080] [CENTER][FONT=Verdana]Awesome stability with no crashes[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]No dupes[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Bank with banktabs[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]23 Fully working skills[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]PKP Shop[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Vote for reward[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Vote point shop[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Prestigeing for points[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Prestige shop[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Glacors[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Jadinkos[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]600+ Items[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Strykewyrm Quest[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Lunar Diplomacy Quest[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Desert Treasure Quest[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Duel Arena[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Fight Pits[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Fight Caves[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Pest Control[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Barrows[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Save teleports[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Slayer system[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Boss tasks[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Corporeal Beast[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Nex[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Charming Imp[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]All chaotics working[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]PvP Armours and weapons[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Achievement System[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Max cape miniquest[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Completionist cape with requirements[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Clanchat[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Dicing[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Mithril seeds (Planting flowers)[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Well thought out economy[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]2 Starters per IP[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Plenty of shops for the starter[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana][B]X2 XP WEEKENDS [/B][/FONT][FONT=Verdana]Auto Donation System[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Skilling Tasks[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Skilling Point Shop[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Skilling Area[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Donators only area[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Donators only slayer dungeon[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Vanguard[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Website Highscores[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]PKing with PK points and Killstreaks[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Loyalty Points[/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#008080][B]When you for the first time log onto SWE Prime you will be asked to complete our newcomers tutorial, this will guide you through the basics of our server including teleportations, skilling and so on. Ontop of this, by completing the tutorial you will be given a small starter pack including some coins, runes, melee armour and ranged equipment to start off with.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/starter.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]To travel in SWE Prime simply speak to the 'Traveler' in edgeville and he will prompt you various choices of teleports such as monster teleports, minigame teleports, PKing teleports and ofcourse the skilling area.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/traveling.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]If you are looking into entering another city there is ofcourse the option of walking, but no-one wants to do that (haha), So instead we can simply use the Fairy ring which is places out here and there throughout the citys, with one being next to the traveler in edgeville. The fairy ring consists of the Lodestone network.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/lodestone.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]To get started on the server the best option would be to either start skilling or kill monsters for drops. Most skilling surrounds the Skilling Area which the Skilling Master is located at, he can sell you various skilling equipment as easy as teleport you to various skilling locations.
We currently have ALL Skills properly working (Except for construction)[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Skillmaster.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]Going onwars on your journey could lead you into starting and completing Achievements which is a requirement to obtain the Completionist Cape. And as Achievements are completed you will receive Achievement Points to spend in the Achievement Shop.
[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]*[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]Ardougne Cloak is used the most by players using summoning familiars as you can manually restore your summoning points twice a day with it.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/achievements.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Crystalkeyachievement.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Achievement%20Store.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Completionist.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]To help us, and yourself you can Vote and select a reward between 2 Crystal Key Lamps which can be used on the Crystal Chest in Edgeville or a Reward Book which grants 1M Coins and 60 Minutes of Double XP. There is also a shop which you can spend you Vote Points in.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Voting.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]When you've played for awhile and maxed out a skill, you can always use the option to prestige, we offer you the chance to prestige in 3 stages, invidual skill prestige, combat prestige and max prestige. All option grants different amounts of points to be spent in the Prestige Shop, which holds Vanguard and Brawler Gloves.
[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]*[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]Brawler gloves grants X2 XP in the skill the glove represents.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Prestige.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]As for the Killer so called (PVMer) we have a wide variety of Monsters and bosses to kill ranging from low level men to creatures passing the levels of 800.[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Chaostunnels.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Bandos.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/FrostDragons.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/slayer.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/bossing.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/Avatar.png[/img]
[COLOR=#008080][B]Our most popular skill is Dungeoneering, which includes 20 different settings for floors and complexitys and awesome rewards!
[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]* [/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]The charming imp is one of the popular items in the shop, it can assist you and pickup charms![/B][/COLOR] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/dungeoneeringteleport.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/New%20Advertisement/dungeoneeringshop.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/charming%20imp.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/SPConfigs/Advertisement/charming%20imp1.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: SWE Prime
item.dc:creator: @SWE_Prime SWE Prime
item.description:
@SWE_Prime wrote:

Thank you very much guys!

Another batch of updates coming here:

Server:
[ul][]Jad can no longer become a boss task
[]Boss task amount lowered to random 8+1
[]Easy, Medium and Hard task amount lowered to random 40+13 (From random 40+25)
[]You can now easily dice through the clanchat you are in
[] New training location added: Ape Atoll (Requires 99 Thieving and Agility to enter)
[]Reward book double XP timer now shows in the quest tab ‘Total Info’
[]Monkey Minder has found his way to edgeville (Outside the building south of general store)
[]Monkey Minder can now bring you to Ape Atoll
[]When dismissing a familiar the dialogue will now close[/ul]

Client:
[ul][*]Removed some objects at ape atoll, reload client to let this be applied[/ul]

Website:
[ul][*]No Website updates has been made.[/ul]



Read full topic

item.title: SWE Prime
item.dc:creator: @SWE_Prime SWE Prime
item.description:
@SWE_Prime wrote:

Appreciated!

Don’t be scared to test us out, you won’t regret it!

Updates #4 05-05
Note: Make sure to refresh your webclient/download the desktop client loader for the client update to take place.

Server:
Butterfly XP payout has been increased by 3x
Implings XP payout has been increased by almost 3x
Chance to fail catching implings has been lowered some more
"Lunar wisdom" clue has been changed and corrected to the new spot
Some fishing XP’s has been buffed up
Rocktail fishing now requires a fishing rod and living minerals
Living minerals has been added to the skilling store

Client:
XP Counter icon should no longer cover any numbers when gaining xp
A Desktop Client Loader has been finished

Website:
The Spoiler tags has been adjusted and fully completed
Desktop Client download has been replaced with the client loader

Read full topic

item.title: SWE Prime
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Mod-Vlad-:

Giving it a shot currently Good luck

Friendly bump
This server really worth trying!

Read full topic

item.title: SWE Prime
item.dc:creator: @SWE_Prime SWE Prime
item.description:
@SWE_Prime wrote:

Appreciated everyone!

Might aswell add the latest 2 updates&patches here aswell:

Updates #1
With this update you must update your client&cache.
You can do this simply by reloading the Webclient or Download the desktop client.

Server:
Added XP Locking on and off
The XP Locked/Unlocked text will now load properly when logging in
Moved the shops north of edgeville bank
Moved the prayer/ancient/curse/lunar altars west of edgeville shop
Extended the starters tutorial and made it more explaining
Finished the Bank PIN System to function properly
Finished requirements for completionist cape
Switching to ancients and lunar no longer requires the quests to be completed
Changed an achievement for everyone to complete
Changed the fail to pickpocked achievement from 100 to 30
Password Encryption added to fulfill full security
XP gain for melee, range and mage has now been set to 1k per hit (900 for range/mage/)
You now gain slayer XP and slayer points again
Prayer xp has been buffed up almost x2 (Bone bury/Bone on altar wise)
Summoning XP has been buffed up
Dungeoneering XP is now obtainable again
Dragonkin lamps XP payout should be as normal again
The payout of prestige points has been re-enabled
Godwars killcount requirement lowered from 20 to 10
The starter has been reduced and balanced out
Configured the X2 XP Ring to function correctly
Alot of items has been added to the automatic donation system which is now live
Finished Charming Imp (Must update client)

Client:
Removed client background
Removed client login box
Made a completely new loading and finished client background
Made a completely new login box
Made a completely new loading bar
Changed color of the loading bar to match the background text
Moved the position of “logging in text”, ‘Connecting to server’ etc to intergrate with the login box
Added a XP Lock button into the equipment tab
Replaced the achievement interface sprites with better looking ones
Changed the names of the shop npcs
Created the X2 XP Ring
Created the Charming Imp
Replaced the slow CrC cache updating to the regular zipped download
Website:
Corrected jar link for the webclient
Completed the store with multiple items and pricing
Created some more boards
Support board including:
Player Reports & Appeals (Can only be viewed by the author of the thread and staff)
Help
Payment Support
Marketplace including:
Buy
Sell
Misc Boards:
Community events in general
Graphics in deadlands
Entertainment in deadlands including:
World news
Intellectual Discussion
Clans including:
General Clan Discussion
Clan Recruitment
2 new forum ranks including:
Developer
Veteran

Post: #1 | Updates #2 03-05
Note: As this is posted early, be aware that new updates may be added onto this throughout the day.

Server:
Removed dagannoth’s (Lvl 90’s) Only lvl 92’s are assigned on slayer task and it was confusing for some.
Failing to thieve will now only hit you a 5 if above 20hp else a 2.
Charming imp has been configured and will now cancel his services if you do not keep him in your inventory
The temp “freeze timer” when teleporting has been lowered slightly for testing purposes and should no longer happen if the player did not teleport
Woodcutting axes chopping a log speed has been increased
A bug in which the sgs special would still heal even after switching weapon is now patched
Corrected a text mistake while pickpocketing
Fight caves waves lowered from 15 to 6
Enchanted gem price lowered to 150 Slayer Points
You can no longer get a task amount below 1
Prestige point payout has been buffed
Protection prayers should now really be protecting you
Chaos elemental should now have multiple attack styles
Changed pricing of seed box to 920k which is what you get if you sell them all
You now have a 50% chance to get torstol in a seed box
Changed pricing of some runes to give an incentive for runecrafting and it’s profit (to other players)
“High” Level runes cannot be sold back to the shop to keep a market for runes (Opinions on this)
Low and High alch xp has been buffed up
Sgs special attack should now also addon prayer points depending on your hit
Crafting XP has been buffed up

Client:
No updates has been made for the client.

Website:
Added a simple javascript to the webclient page prompting you to logout safely before navigating away.
Made some forum buttons (Still needs quite some work)
A Thank you plugin has been installed onto the forums to let people be able to thank people per-post.
Picture limit in signature extended from 2 to 4
Avatar Dimension extended from 100x100 to 140x140 and size from 10kb to 140kb

Todays update list will be available on the forums later today!

Read full topic

item.title: SWE Prime
item.dc:creator: @SWE_Prime SWE Prime
item.description:
@SWE_Prime wrote:

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com/config”][/URL]

[B][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com/”]
[/URL][/B] [SIZE=6][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com”][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Website[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana]
[/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR] [SIZE=6][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com/config”][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Webclient[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana]
[/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR] [SIZE=6][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com/config”][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Desktop Client[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][COLOR=#a9a9a9][CENTER][FONT=Verdana]
[/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR] [SIZE=6][URL=http://“http://sweprime.com/Highscores”][COLOR=#008080]Swe Prime Highscores[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE]
[CENTER][FONT=Verdana]
[COLOR=#008080]24/7 Uptime[/COLOR][/FONT][/CENTER][COLOR=#008080]
[CENTER][FONT=Verdana]Awesome stability with no crashes[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]No dupes[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Bank with banktabs[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]23 Fully working skills[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]PKP Shop[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Vote for reward[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Vote point shop[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Prestigeing for points[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Prestige shop[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Glacors[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Jadinkos[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]600+ Items[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Strykewyrm Quest[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Lunar Diplomacy Quest[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Desert Treasure Quest[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Duel Arena[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Fight Pits[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Fight Caves[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Pest Control[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Barrows[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Save teleports[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Slayer system[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Boss tasks[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Corporeal Beast[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Nex[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Charming Imp[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]All chaotics working[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]PvP Armours and weapons[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Achievement System[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Max cape miniquest[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Completionist cape with requirements[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Clanchat[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Dicing[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Mithril seeds (Planting flowers)[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Well thought out economy[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]2 Starters per IP[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Plenty of shops for the starter[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana][B]X2 XP WEEKENDS
[/B][/FONT][FONT=Verdana]Auto Donation System[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Skilling Tasks[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Skilling Point Shop[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Skilling Area[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Donators only area[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Donators only slayer dungeon[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Vanguard[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Website Highscores[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]PKing with PK points and Killstreaks[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Loyalty Points[/FONT][/CENTER][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]When you for the first time log onto SWE Prime you will be asked to complete our newcomers tutorial, this will guide you through the basics of our server including teleportations, skilling and so on. Ontop of this, by completing the tutorial you will be given a small starter pack including some coins, runes, melee armour and ranged equipment to start off with.[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]To travel in SWE Prime simply speak to the ‘Traveler’ in edgeville and he will prompt you various choices of teleports such as monster teleports, minigame teleports, PKing teleports and ofcourse the skilling area.[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]If you are looking into entering another city there is ofcourse the option of walking, but no-one wants to do that (haha), So instead we can simply use the Fairy ring which is places out here and there throughout the citys, with one being next to the traveler in edgeville. The fairy ring consists of the Lodestone network.[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]To get started on the server the best option would be to either start skilling or kill monsters for drops.
Most skilling surrounds the Skilling Area which the Skilling Master is located at, he can sell you various skilling equipment as easy as teleport you to various skilling locations.

We currently have ALL Skills properly working (Except for construction)[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]Going onwars on your journey could lead you into starting and completing Achievements which is a requirement to obtain the Completionist Cape.
And as Achievements are completed you will receive Achievement Points to spend in the Achievement Shop.

[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]*[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]Ardougne Cloak is used the most by players using summoning familiars as you can manually restore your summoning points twice a day with it.[/B][/COLOR]



[COLOR=#008080][B]To help us, and yourself you can Vote and select a reward between 2 Crystal Key Lamps which can be used on the Crystal Chest in Edgeville or a Reward Book which grants 1M Coins and 60 Minutes of Double XP.
There is also a shop which you can spend you Vote Points in.[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]When you’ve played for awhile and maxed out a skill, you can always use the option to prestige, we offer you the chance to prestige in 3 stages, invidual skill prestige, combat prestige and max prestige. All option grants different amounts of points to be spent in the Prestige Shop, which holds Vanguard and Brawler Gloves.

[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]*[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]Brawler gloves grants X2 XP in the skill the glove represents.[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#008080][B]As for the Killer so called (PVMer) we have a wide variety of Monsters and bosses to kill ranging from low level men to creatures passing the levels of 800.[/B][/COLOR]





[COLOR=#008080][B]Our most popular skill is Dungeoneering, which includes 20 different settings for floors and complexitys and awesome rewards!

[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#fff0f5][B]* [/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008080][B]The charming imp is one of the popular items in the shop, it can assist you and pickup charms![/B][/COLOR]



[/CENTER]

Read full topic
